mapper.select:
select count(*) from t_feedback a where 1=1
and a.feedback_content like "%"#{feedbackContent}"%"
and a.create_time > STR_TO_DATE(#{beginTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and a.create_time < STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and a.create_user_id = #{userId}
select DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time,feedback_id,feedback_content from t_feedback where 1=1 and feedback_id=#{feedbackId}
